name: Bone Boy (itch)
description:
WASD to move, LMB to throw ribs!

taking damage or shooting will cause you to lose ribs. At 0 ribs, you die!

Definitely missing a lot of things, but was a fun concept to make, and I learned a lot- very new to game dev. Definitely overscoped, but it was worth it to learn how to make so many different things.

made with Argus_Pan0ptes for Mini Jam 92.
